definitions.title: vb.
definitions.body: trickle, drip, synon. of [[נזל]], II. [[ערף]] (cf. Ar. ra9afa flow (of blood), bleed (of the nose));—

definitions.title: Qal
definitions.body: Impf. 3 mpl. [[יִרְעְפוּ]], of clouds Job 36:28 (c. [[עֲלֵי]] pers.; ‖[[יִזְּלוּ]]), c. acc. mat. [[טַל]] Pr 3:20; fig. [[מַעְגׇּלֶיךָ יִרְעֲפוּן דָָּשֶׁן]] Ps 65:12 (i.e. fertilizing rain); subj. of moistened ground, [[נְאוֹת מִדְבָּר]], v:Ps 65:13.

definitions.title: Hiph.
definitions.body: Imv. mpl. [[הַרְעִיפוּ]] Is 45:8 trickle, O heavens, from above (fig.: ‖[[יִּוְּלוּ חֶרֶק ]]).
